H0.text: Which Syrian city is said to be the oldest continually inhabited city in the world. Aleppo

H1.text: Which Syrian city is said to be the oldest continually inhabited city in the world. Homs

H2.text: Which Syrian city is said to be the oldest continually inhabited city in the world. Latakia

H3.text: Which Syrian city is said to be the oldest continually inhabited city in the world. دمشق

A4.text: Damascus is one of the oldest continuously inhabited cities in the world.

A5.text: Damascus is the oldest capital city in the world.
